name: Antiquarian
description:
Controls

E - Steal / Interract / Skip dialogue

WASD - Move

Shift - Dash (available as an upgrade when you progress trough the game)

Content

You play as an antiquarian named David who tragically passes away at a young age and has his soul bound to an Imp! With the Imps command you must go out there and collect as many valuable artifacts as you can.

How to play ? 

Extract the files to a folder and run SaudiGJ3.exe

This game has been made for the

 Saudi Game Jam

In 5 days by the team : Bean Gang

All art,animations,music,sounds,programming made during the jam.

Font
